Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Polygon

Packages that use Polygon
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes. 
 

Uses of Polygon in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes that return Polygon
 Polygon Polygon.clone()
          Overwritten with public visibility as recommended in Cloneable.
 Polygon Polygon.getCopy()
          Returns a copy of this Polygon, which is made up by the same points.
 Polygon Rectangle.getRotatedCCW(Angle alpha, Point center)
          Rotates this Rectangle counter-clock-wise by the given Angle alpha around the Point center.
 Polygon Rectangle.getRotatedCW(Angle alpha, Point center)
          Rotates this Rectangle clock-wise by the given Angle alpha around the Point center.
 Polygon Polygon.getTranslated(double dx, double dy)
          Returns a new Polygon which is shifted along each axis by the passed values.
 Polygon Polygon.getTranslated(Point pt)
          Returns a new Polygon which is shifted by the position of the given Point.
 Polygon Polygon.rotateCCW(Angle alpha, Point center)
          Rotates this Polygon counter-clock-wise by the given Angle alpha around the given Point center.
 Polygon Polygon.rotateCW(Angle alpha, Point center)
          Rotates this Polygon clock-wise by the given Angle alpha around the given Point center.
 Polygon Polygon.scale(double factor, Point center)
          Scales this Polygon object by the given factor from the given center Point.
 Polygon Rectangle.toPolygon()
          Converts this Rectangle into a Polygon representation.
 Polygon Polygon.translate(double dx, double dy)
          Moves this Polygon horizontally by dx and vertically by dy, then returns this Rectangle for convenience.
 Polygon Polygon.translate(Point p)
          Moves this Polygon horizontally by the x value of the given Point and vertically by the y value of the given Point, then returns this Rectangle for convenience.
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes with parameters of type Polygon
 boolean Polygon.contains(Polygon p)
          Checks whether the given Polygon is fully contained within this Polygon.
 boolean Ellipse.contains(Polygon polygon)
          Tests if this Ellipse contains the given Polygon polygon.
 Point[] Polygon.getIntersections(Polygon polygon)
          Returns the points of intersection between this Polygon and the given other Polygon polygon.
 Point[] Ellipse.getIntersections(Polygon polygon)
          Returns the intersection points of this Ellipse's outline with the given Polygon's outline.
 boolean Polygon.intersects(Polygon p)
          Checks if there is at least a common point between this Polygon and the given Polygon, which includes the case that the given Polygon is fully contained within this Polygon or vice versa.
 boolean Ellipse.intersects(Polygon polygon)
          Tests if this Ellipse intersects the given Polygon polygon.
